name: grade-calc
title: Grade Calc
description: Easily calculate your grade in a given test using your points.
author: dan_schumacher

commands.name: calculate-test-grade
commands.title: Calculate Test Grade
commands.subtitle: Calculate grade using your point total
commands.description: Calculate your grade in a test using your point total and the maximum points available using the standard grading formula: {Achieved points} x 5 / {Maximum points} + 1

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
